Summary: 4 lights descending in a weird pattern, like a leaf, and flashing randomly.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe drove to the Target on Southern and Gilbert, and as we parked the car, my husband pointed out that there were some lights towards the south. At first I dismissed him telling him that they were airplanes. But when I noticed that their flight pattern was erratic compared to an airplane or helicopter (an airplane was just flying by and I could compare the flight pattern), then I realized we were experiencing at an UFO sighting. It took about 5-8 minutes for the lights to completely disappear. The seemed to be falling like a leaf and sort of flashing. My husband spotted trails behind these objects. After about 8 minutes, we couldn't see them anymore as they disappeared behind a building. The picture attached was taken when only two lights remained. I cropped the second image to show the two remaining lights. There was another family that stopped by and looked at that general direction.
